unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhojem electricity bill hea mhoineak ₹3500 ailem! Fattim mhoineak fokot ₹2800 aslem. Mhaka mhojem AC consumption check korunk zai ashe dishta; tem disak sumar 10 voram chalu asta.
normalised: Arey yaar, mhojem electricity bill hea mhoineak teen hozar panchso rupia aaylem! Fattlea mhoineak fokot don hozar aathso rupia aslem. Huum, mhaka mhojem A-C consumption check korchem poddttelem; tem sumar dha voram disak chalu asta.
text: Arre yaar, mhojem electricity bill hea mhoineak ₹3500 ailem! Fattim mhoineak fokot ₹2800 aslem. Mhaka mhojem AC consumption check korunk zai ashe dishta; tem disak sumar 10 voram chalu asta.
